channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-2611] upgrade test incorrectly tries to test in place compress in 10.0 release.
item.description:
When trying to run upgrade test in trunk with all releases available for upgrade to test found at:
https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/jars/10.2.2.0/

I got 4 errors (not including those that are part of DERBY-2598).:

1) testNegValueSupportedLogRecord(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.up
gradeTests.Changes10_3)java.sql.SQLException: 'SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_INPLACE_COMPRESS
_TABLE' is not recognized as a function or procedure.

ion.java:305)

ticMethodCallNode.java:224)

oSQLValueNode.java:243)

item.summary: upgrade test incorrectly tries to test in place compress in 10.0 release.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
checkin 535429 fixes the two errors from testNegValueSupportedLogRecord.
The other two errors do not look like they are related so I will report
those under a separate item.

The fix was just to insure that the test did not try to test in place compress
log record in 10.0, as it was added in 10.1.
